analysis.description:
CHIPSale.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#658-676) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.setAllowanceBeforeWithdrawal(msg.sender,address(this),tokensInWei) (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#671)
	-tokenReward.transferFrom(msg.sender,tokenReward.owner(),tokensInWei) (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#672-673)

Reentrancy in CHIPSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#624-657):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transferFrom(tokenReward.owner(),msg.sender,numTokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#639-656)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundingCapReached (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#655)
	- fundingGoalReached (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#654-655)
	- saleClosed (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#655)

Reentrancy in CHIPSale.ownerAllocateTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#689-701):
	External calls:
	- ! tokenReward.transferFrom(tokenReward.owner(),_to,amountMiniCHP) (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#692-694)

	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#695-696)

	- saleClosed (/unique_chucks/17/0x233d0f4c69f0fecdf539642ebcef7ba5f1eedfbb.sol#701)
